summary: Implements the Solovay‑Kitaev algorithm to approximate any single‑qubit unitary by a sequence of gates drawn from a configurable discrete universal basis, using recursive refinement and optional pre‑computed basic approximations.
business_intent: Enable quantum circuit transpilation that rewrites arbitrary single‑qubit operations into fault‑tolerant gate sets, providing controllable approximation accuracy for reliable execution on hardware with limited native gates.
